analysis.description:
PumaPayPullPayment.executePullPayment (/unique_chucks/2/0xeb417d2e61c13c693f7c62257f347283e0a23b49.sol#743-763) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(_client,msg.sender,amountInPMA) (/unique_chucks/2/0xeb417d2e61c13c693f7c62257f347283e0a23b49.sol#761-762)

PumaPayToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xeb417d2e61c13c693f7c62257f347283e0a23b49.sol#399)
